PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Language: C         

The line follower in the bottom platform follows a Zig Zag path with check points. The Photovore is a light sensory robot running on a glass platform above the line follower following the light flashed by the line follower stalking it. The Photovore will flash LEDs when it detects a black colored check points. The Line Follower will flash LEDs on detecting White markers. The algorithm is optimized making the bot to detect and respond to different angled turns efficiently and have perfect stalking.

Language: C, JAVA 

Multiprocessor scheduling in a heterogeneous processor environment with process dependencies using Genetic Algorithm thereby reducing makespan. Multiprocessor scheduling is one of the hardest combinatorial optimization problems (NP hard problem). The work focuses on task dependency taking into account its communication cost, processor utilization, preference to independence tasks and minimizing makespan.

Language: Auto-IT  

                                  WALKing SOFTware is an installation free software package with many windows utilities programs that can customize windows like
-Power Control 
-Windows transparency changer 
-Energy calculator 
-Shortcut keys for opening all documents and also to control CD drive and many other utilities like 
-Motion detector 
-Self destructor 
-System and File info 
-Key spy logger and spywares for system security
